scenes.title: Impact
scenes.speaker: System
scenes.body: Asteroid shower incoming. Hull breach imminent. Navigation offline. Your partner's hand finds your in the dark.

choices.text: Seal cockpit bulkhead and attempt emergency landing. Leave it to fate.

scenes.title: Emergency Descent
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You seal the cockpit but power surges, control fails. The planet rushes up. You and your partner lock oxygen masks and brace for impact as the world goes dark.

scenes.title: System Collapse
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You divert power, but the grid overloads. The ship enters uncontrolled freefall. Structural failure becomes total. You do not survive.

scenes.title: Last Broadcast
scenes.speaker: PLAYER 1
scenes.body: "Mayday. Shipâ€¦ lost. Crashing. We hold course."  You squeeze their hand. Static. Then nothing.

scenes.title: Wreckage
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: Cold metal. Wind. A single, blinking oxygen canister. The other seat is empty, harness shredded.

choices.text: Follow the distress beacon into the canyon
Stay near the ship and conserve oxygen. Wait for rescue

scenes.title: Signal Found
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: The beacon's steady glow is a heartbeat in the void. They're alive. They're waiting.

scenes.title: Containment Failure
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You wait too long in the wreckage. Oxygen runs out. Your vision goes dark and the silence is complete and everlasting.

scenes.title: Voyage
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: A shadow peels from the canyon wall. It is tall, terrible, and its eyes are pits of cold judgment.

scenes.title: Voyage
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You feel that your body is not moving, as if something *or someone* is holding you in place.

scenes.title: Voyage
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: You, humans, are worthless creatures, Prove your soul has weight.

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: 'You do not run. Curious. The other did. Answer. Your worth hangs in the balance.'

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: Someone you love deeply holds a belief you find abhorrent. To truly save them from it, would you:

choices.text: Break their heart, turn them against you, and force upon them a painful truth.
You allow them to remain happily wrong.

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: An intriguing choice.

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: Your partner is closer to the beacon. If you sabotage them, your claim is secure. They would never know it was you. Is your professional camaraderie stronger than your desire to succeed?

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: Interesting decision

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: I watched your partner enter my domain. They spoke of you. They believed you would hesitate in the final moment, that your moral squeamishness made you weak. Does this change your desire to find them?

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: How peculiar.

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: I will let you go further but your partner will die. Will you accept?

choices.text: No. Even if they think I am weak. I refuse to let them die. Even if it is at the cost of my own life, it is a choice that I make.
Yes. I'm tired of losing. Maybe this is how I win.

scenes.title: Ending
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: A choice of the heart not of the mind. You have chosen the right answer and may pass. ut what you find will break you. To go forward is to accept a terrible truth. To go back is to accept the death you refused.

scenes.title: Morality
scenes.speaker: Monster
scenes.body: You traded a soul for a soul. An unworthy choice. The punishment is death.

scenes.title: Ending
scenes.speaker: NARRATOR
scenes.body: You find ancient ruins. There on the jagged rocks lies an oxygen mask. Blood paints the stone surrouding the broken mask.

scenes.title: THE END
scenes.speaker: The team
scenes.body: Thank you for playing our game.
